website_summaries.verdict: This Merrell offering seems to capture the fancy of individuals, thanks primarily to its comfort and lightweight design. The boot’s waterproofness and surface traction also contribute to its stellar trail performance.However, its lack of arch support comes off as a detriment to those who have used it outdoors. All in all, the Merrell Yokota 2 Mid Waterproof may still be a remarkable option for day hikes, granted its footbed is replaced with a more supportive variant.
pros: A majority of users say that the Merrell Yokota 2 Mid Waterproof is an insanely comfortable hiking boot
Numerous outdoor lovers find its lightness refreshing when traversing a trail
According to more than a handful of consumer reviews, the footgear’s waterproof membrane is effective against the elements
Based on a bunch of customers, the Yokota 2 Mid Waterproof’s outsole bequeaths sufficient grip on most types of terrain
A minority of shoppers love the ankle support this Merrell offering gives
A couple of buyers confirm that its break-in period is non-existent
cons: Several outdoor enthusiasts express their disappointment over the Merrell Yokota 2 Mid Waterproof’s insufficient arch support
Some wearers say that it is a bit warm for their tastes
A purchaser mentions that one of the boot’s lace loops broke off after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because I knew I would be hiking in the mountains, and have need for both comfort and stability. These were recommended, and I am 100% happy with my purchase. They required no breaking in, are lightweight, but tough enough for light hiking. The waterproof feature came in very handy, as I was able to walk through marshy land and even jump into low water without betting even a little damp. I used them hard for 5 days straight, and they still look new. I cannot recommend these enough. I will say, I did not do intensive, all terrain hiking. But for simple, everyday use, with day-hikes and such, these are absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Creagar

customer_reviews.title: Lace strap pulled out, but boots are being replaced by Merrell
customer_reviews.text: I loved the lightness and fit, but there was clearly a defective lace strap (eyelet). The strap did not have enough of one end secured by stitching, and it pulled out after less than one year of occasional use. I contacted Merrell CUSTOMER SERVICE at (800) 288-3124, and after I provided pictures, they have agreed to send me a pair of similar (exact not available) pair of hikers. I was very pleased with there service, they are even located in my state of Indiana.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I have had numerous pairs of Merrell shoes and bots. I was concerned, because of the low price that these may not have been up to the usual standard. Fear not these are lower end Merrell boots and quite good, at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking light duty boots, but not much support or stability.
customer_reviews.text: They didn't provide very much support or stability, so I sent them back using the prepaid mailing label that was included in the box. They might be OK for urban lounging, but I would not want to walk or hike very far in them. Your feet will vary. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mike in PDX

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are some of the best I have purchased in a long time. I work construction and I have put these boots to the test on a daily basis. I would highly recommend them . I feel like I actually got my money's worth with these boots. Will be purchasing another pair. And would highly recommend because I have used mine in cold .wet. hot conditions. Even held up working on a 10-12 roof for over a month and I still wear them on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: ashiejoy

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable out of the box. Have high arches which i need and are durable. I have used them for work around the property, and hiking as well as just going out on errands. My new go to shoes. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: shoobeedoobee

customer_reviews.title: Too bad there is not a wider width available....
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately they were not wide enough, although I got the widest available. I had to return them. I liked the color and style. The insole felt very comfortable as well. They were really just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband to work around the yard and he almost would not wear them, He thought they were to nice but was so glad he did. He has a medium size narrow foot with a high arch and these fit him perfectly. He said they are very comfortable and wore them all day the first day and no complaints., I am going to get him another to wear casually.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes !
customer_reviews.text: I've had many Merrell shoes and they are very good shoes , they always fit well with really no break in. I have used them for work and they hold up very well. All in all a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable, light weight boot
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears these to work everyday. He says, they are the most comfortable boots he has every worn. They don't make his legs tired after being on his feet all day. They are light weight and very well constructed. These are hiking boots and not made for the shop floor. He did step on a nail and it came through the bottom. So the sole is not that of a working boot but again they aren't working boots. He likes these so much for the comfort that we bought another pair and he said he would just have to watch where he was walking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a good product. I trust the Merrell name. I wanted a low cut hiker and this looks right. Haven't worn yet so I'll hold off on the 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: what the
customer_reviews.text: Received as a gift from my wife. After 2 used the eyelet for the strings broke loose. always had purchased Merrell boots and have lasted 4 years plus under heavy use. very disapointed in this pair. after reading several others having the same issue, Dont know if it is a Merrell issue on this particular style or not, intend on following up with customer service.
customer_reviews.author: T. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Performed great through the rock scrambles!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes did a great job through the rock scrambles of Old Rag VA. I bought them new for the 10 mile circuit and did not need a break in period. They breathed well and provided exceptional comfort leaving my feet blister free. I have ordered other Merrell products for canyoneering in Costa Rica so I was already confident with the fit and comfort. As far as men’s sizes I would recommend ordering the exact size you nee.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B Darrin

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and looks.
customer_reviews.text: I have never gotten any order this fast. Shoes fit well. Good old Merrell. This makes my 13 pair I have right now. I hope to get 6 years out of all of them. I use them for everything. They look good and 10.5 size is perfect in every pair ihave.!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: marque mccaw

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED COMMENT
customer_reviews.text: These shoes cost $100 ,you would expect them to last longer than 3 months and am unable to return them because it’s past the return date . Very soon the other two lace loops will give out then they won’t be wearable any longer..see picture . Very disappointed as I have bought Merrill’s before and loved them . UPDATE: We were able to contact Merrell directly and they were very very gracious and sent us a new pair of boots ... my husband is happy again 🤗... and we would definitely buy and business with them again .
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Run narrow....
customer_reviews.text: Merrell are narrower go with your longer size you usually wear. I’m mostly 11 to get width I need though my actual size of foot is 10.5. These are lighter than Moabs not built as rugged. We have big rocky climbs coming up at high elevation and I think they’ll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. Have hiked Rocky Mountain National Park for 4 days on long (6-10 miles) hikes, and short hikes. These are great in the water, and feet feel great after finishing. Would buy again in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.author: Doug Malm

customer_reviews.title: WARRANTY not honored!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Merrell shoes for years because of the high quality. I requested a return/refund withing 90 days of receiving the shoes. Peltz Shoes won't stand behind them. Amazon neither. I contacted Merrell 2 days ago and have not received a reply. Beware purchasing Merrell shoes and definitely don't purchase from Peltz.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McKey

customer_reviews.title: I can use them everyday
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable and the blue-grey color match every style. I ordered 11.5 and it fit as expected. I know this brand last for a long time, considering that I destroy shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Saint Peter

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good fit.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit great. I can wear a 10 1/2 regular or a 10 wide if available. Since these came in a 10 wide, I got them. They are snug, comfortable, and great to wear, walk in, and hike in.
customer_reviews.author: J. Detwiler

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and returned after a week of normal use. Too narrow and very uncomfortable. I replaced with a pair of Columbia hiking boots (cheaper by $15 and free returns). The Columbia, although much cheaper are much more comfortable and fit perfectly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, didn't need to break in
customer_reviews.text: This a very comfortable shoe for me. No discomfort from the first day I wore them. I used them in colder weather (40 F) and light rain and they keep my feet dry. But I would not say that they are super warm, but they were warm enough.
customer_reviews.author: gh423

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Confortable
customer_reviews.text: I use my Merrill Boots for everyday use, they are very comfortable and being that it’s the rainy season out here the fact that they are waterproof is fantastic. They fit extremely well and there really is nothing bad to say about them .
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Roman

customer_reviews.title: awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: Feels and fits better than I expected. Very comfortable. Haven't done any serious hiking in them yet but I'm hoping they will hold up. Very reasonable price also.
customer_reviews.author: RonR

customer_reviews.title: Great Hiking Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fits just as I expected. Very high quality construction. Much lighter then expected. They feel like much more expensive hiking shoes. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking boots
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect and feel comfortable right out of the box. Very sharp looking mid hiking boots. So far, so good walking 4 miles a day.
customer_reviews.author: Randy W

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for my husband. He really likes them. But within two months of wearing them, one of the eyelets has torn. So, we are not too hopeful that they will be lasting very long.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen A. Proietta

customer_reviews.title: Only Merrell's will do...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wearing only these Merrell boots for years. They last him about 6 months, he has about 6 old pairs in the closet that I'm gonna steal and donate.
customer_reviews.author: E. L. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Have purchased Merrell for years
customer_reviews.text: They need to pay more attention to quality control. Not as good as previous pairs, but do think they still beat the competition for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: Fit good
customer_reviews.text: I like wearing hard hiking boots they are low-cut I'm used to the ones that a little bit higher but they feel good comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. My old pair lasted many miles of hiking, walking, and yard work. Great comfort and support. It's great walking through, not around, puddles and streams!
customer_reviews.author: Phil Carstensen

customer_reviews.title: has manufacturing defect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hiking boots in February 2020 and was very pleased with them in the field. However I went to put them on this morning and one of the eyelets snapped when I tried to snug up the shoe for a proper fit. This is unacceptable and I am wondering if there is a way to be compensated for this obvious defect in manufacturing or design. I have bought several boots by Merrell and would rather not change brands.
customer_reviews.author: patrick j. crotty

customer_reviews.title: AAHHH, Walking pleasure
customer_reviews.text: I forgot how comfy a new pair of Merrell's are. Slip right on, like walking on clouds. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Better support ?
customer_reviews.text: They fit great. They were very comfortable on their first hike. Then the next day the shoelace loop broke and now I’m trying to deal with Merrell
customer_reviews.author: joe sauer

customer_reviews.title: there is NO vibram soles
customer_reviews.text: no vibram soles.you can feel every little rock you step on.these feel more like a heavy sneaker for mall walking.im surprised.merrell name, but not the quality here.update:i wrote to merrel about these shoes.sent a picture of the defect.and they replaced the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and comfy
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good and they are comfortable. The price is on the higher end of what I like to pay so hopefully they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: WhiteWiggly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Closing in on 100 miles of mostly packed earth trails and I'm still in love with my yokota 2 boots. Walking on pavment in them isn't my idea of a good time but it happens on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Elden C. Coning III

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Took the boots right of the box and went on an intermediate hike. The boots were comfortable, no slippage, not too much pressure above the ankles, especially while either hiking up or down a steep pitch. Walked through some shallow water runoffs and creeks, feet stayed dry. Great boot for beginner to intermediate hikers! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: Love Merrell shoes but these ones don’t hold up to their brand. Within 6 months one of the eyelets ripped open. Very disappointing when you pay a higher price for a name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! Straight out of the box to a hike at Red Rock. Light, comfortable and good grip! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!!
customer_reviews.text: The Yokota 2 was just what I was looking for in a Wide Width shoe! I bought them to try as I previously had the Merrill MOAB 2 boots. These are more comfortable and durable. Not to mention that they really are waterproof (which was not exactly the case with my MOAB 2 boots). Great quality shoe from a great company!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Usually these are spot on. The fit was tight and no give.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Broken Shoelace Ring
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Merrells for nearly 20 years. I love'em. However, this particular shoe broke yesterday. These shoe typically last 9 - 12 months before the soles wear thin. However, Ive had this pair for nearly 4 months and the lace ring broke while claiming a ladder.
customer_reviews.author: philip combs

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Second time I went to wear them the lace loop snapped. Will be contacting Merrell about a replacement pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as advertised and on time. Previous reviews were helpful order normal size. These shoes are both lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, prompt arrival, excellent quality. I use these boots for everyday wear which includes a lot of dog walking in wooded areas, thus the waterproof aspect was quite important and so far it's working out fine. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Not close on advertised size.
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Merrill’s and have never had an issue until this pair... by far the worse pair of shoes I have ever put on my feet.. not even close to the size ordered. Maybe these were maid somewhere different than the other 7 pairs I have owned but these sucked.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Babb

customer_reviews.title: Merrells for life
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about them they were as expected. These are the only shoes my husband wear to work. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D.P.

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of merrel shoes but this pair claims to be water proof, walking through wet grass on the farm i live on these shoes where completely saturated within an hour. complete unsatisfied i hope Merrell has something to say about this.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Hiking Newbie
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a quality hiking shoe. An experienced hiker friend uses this same model and recommended. Had to return original pair and go half size larger. Seller very accommodating on exchange and received larger pair in only a few days. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: whahu

customer_reviews.title: Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fit and wears as expected for size twelve foot
customer_reviews.author: bmwtool27

customer_reviews.title: Great hikers.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and true to size. Wore them in heavy rain first day I had them, feet stayed dry.
customer_reviews.author: tim warner

customer_reviews.title: More expensive than the quality warrants
customer_reviews.text: Waited 4 years to buy, expensive but good reputation. Had 1week, wore 3 times, shoelace eyelet broke...glad I wasn't hiking or hunting. Guess I'll try columbia, keen or redhead
customer_reviews.author: Tony B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in a brand i thought i could trust
customer_reviews.text: Used the boots for pool work. Not much of a waterproof shoe/boot. And to top it off 3 weeks into wearing them one of the shoe lace loops broke. Pretty disappointed after all the hype around a merrel boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Merrell Yokota II Mid shoes. They fit true to size and the quality is better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Really good boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing to walk in the park. I have been using them to train for "El Camino de Santiago" From the first day I felt them comfortable and so far I have walked up to 15 miles on Saturdays.
customer_reviews.author: Enmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: Great boots I wear them 8-10 hours a day very comfortable. Will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Put on and enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Great piar of mids... fit is really good.. no break in time..
customer_reviews.author: St corny

customer_reviews.title: You can never go wrong with Merrill shoes.
customer_reviews.text: They are the best hiking shoes I have ever had. Outstanding product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and it's actually waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Great boot! A little on the sweaty side, but since it's actually waterproof I can handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots with fair price. Have enjoyed others of this brand and they hold up well
customer_reviews.author: Greg Cutter

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: I have only have worn these for 3 days and the stitching is starting to come apart on the toe part!
customer_reviews.author: John M. Herring

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Just received them were for two days do far and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lamond

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This hiking shoe already lost an eyelet day one, not sure how tight I can keep them if this continues
customer_reviews.author: Alvah Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my adult son. HE LOVES THEM!
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Ziebarth

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Love my new boots. Was really looking at a different color but was out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well put together!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Bought a 1/2 size larger this time to give more room. Fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad design on eye lets
customer_reviews.text: Had for a month and the eye lets already ripped out won’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: len prochaska

customer_reviews.title: Really small and narrow for a boot and wide size
customer_reviews.text: Really small and narrow for a boot and wide size
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: very nice but not waterproof as stated in add !!!
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Walk like a King
customer_reviews.text: Merrell Men's Yokota 2 Mid Waterproof Hiking Boot is a dream to walk-on. Thank you Merrell and Amazon. Enildo Molano 10/8/2020 San Francisco
customer_reviews.author: enildo molano

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Yokota 2 MID Waterproof Hiking Boot, Bracken, 11 W US
product_meta.description: Men's Merrell, Yokota 2 Mid Waterproof Wide Boots A durable waterproof boot that's ready for a long day out on the trails Suede and textile upper with breathable mesh lining Bellows tongue keeps debris out Protective rubber toe cap Molded TPU heel counter for added stability Kinetic Fit Base removable contoured insole with Merrell Air Cushion in the heel Molded nylon arch shank Durable outsole with 4mm lug depth. Heel Height of 1.50 inches
feature_bullets: Kinetic Fit BASE insole is contoured like your foot and provides flexible, intuitive support for connected and protected movement
Merrell Air Cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability
